mapper.select: select r_no, c_no, nickname. content, reg_date from reply where c_no=#{c_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(r_no, c_no, nickname, content, reg_date) VALUES(seq_reply_no.nextval, #{c_no}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET content=#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE r_no=#{r_no} and c_no=#{c_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reply WHERE r_no=#{r_no} and c_no=#{c_no}
